channel.title: Shops don't accept cash for certain things
channel.description: I believe this is called currency. Most of the tutorials I looked at changed the WHOLE currency, so how would I make it so only certain shops take the item?

item.title: Shops don't accept cash for certain things
item.dc:creator: @_mpire £mpire
item.description:
@_mpire wrote:

You can make a shop only accept one thing but i don’t know about one specific item.

Read full topic
item.source: Shops don't accept cash for certain things
